snippet: Paul D. Ryan is now unquestionably the face of the Tea Party caucus in Washington, and his success is certain to embolden House lawmakers whose proudly unyielding approach to governance has contributed to legislative gridlock.
abstract: Paul D. Ryan is now unquestionably the face of the Tea Party caucus in Washington, and his success is certain to embolden House lawmakers whose proudly unyielding approach to governance has contributed to legislative gridlock.

headline.main: Tea Party Hopes to Gain Larger Stage in Election With Romney's Pick
headline.print_headline: Tea Party Hopes to Gain Larger Stage in Election With Romney’s Pick
